exhibition_title: Blown Out of Proportion: A Survey of Studio Glass
exhibition_description: The first display of glass in the Instituteâ€™s Contemporary Ceramics and Glass Gallery, this installation featured 10-15 works of studio glass, beginning with examples by pioneering personalities in the movement from the 1950s-1970s, and following through with the work of contemporary designers. These American and international glass objects were drawn from the Institute as well as from local collections.
